channel.title: [508] Just the final touch of Shops.. Can't get it
channel.description:
I've been working on this for about 8-10 hours and I still cannot figure it out.. I supposedly added everything right but with every NPC I try, it won't let me trade him.. Why? [code]Unhandled npc option 1 : 146 <- id.[/code] Keeps coming up with that. And his ID is 552.. Not 142..
This is my npc [code]spawn = 552 3078 3498 0 0 0 0 0 Shopkeeper (test)[/code]
My shop in Shops.java [code] public int[] skillcapeStore = {9747, 9749, 9750, 9752, 9753, 9755, 9756, 9758, 9759, 9761, 9762, 9764, 9777, 9779, 9768, 9770, 9786, 9788, 9748, 9751, 9754, 9757, 9760, 9763, 9769, 9778, 9787, 9798, 9799, 9800, 9801, 9802, 9803}; public int[] skillcapeStoreN = {50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50};[/code]
What I added in ShopHandler.java [code] case 20: // Shop Case shopopen(p, 700); // shop id items = Engine.shops.skillcapeStore; // Declaring this from Shops.java itemsN = Engine.shops.skillcapeStoreN; // Declaring this from Shops.java p.getActionSender().setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); p.getActionSender().setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, items, itemsN); break;[/code]
What I added in NPCOption1 & 2 [code] case 552: //Shopkeeper (test) Engine.ShopHandler.openshop(p, 20); //Test p.message("You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab"); break;[/code] ------------------- And this is till all I get.. [code]Unhandled npc option 1 : 146 <- id.[/code] Now what I did notice is that the case numbers in NPCOption1 & 2 didn't correspond to the NPC ID's that they were sync'd with. But they still work. I'm a bit confused..
If anyone could help I have: [b]TeamViewer:[/b] 228 987 374 [b]----Pass:[/b] PM me for it. [b]MSN Messenger:[/b] Ethanbowne@yahoo.com [b]Skype:[/b] Ogreslay

item.title: [508] Just the final touch of Shops.. Can't get it
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

I’ve been working on this for about 8-10 hours and I still cannot figure it out…
I supposedly added everything right but with every NPC I try, it won’t let me trade him… Why?

Unhandled npc option 1 : 146 <- id.

Keeps coming up with that. And his ID is 552… Not 142…

This is my npc

spawn	=	552	3078	3498	0	0	0	0	0	Shopkeeper (test)

My shop in Shops.java

public int[] skillcapeStore = {9747, 9749, 9750, 9752, 9753, 9755, 9756, 9758, 9759, 9761, 9762, 9764, 9777, 9779, 9768, 9770, 9786, 9788, 9748, 9751, 9754, 9757, 9760, 9763, 9769, 9778, 9787, 9798, 9799, 9800, 9801, 9802, 9803}; public int[] skillcapeStoreN = {50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50};

What I added in ShopHandler.java

case 20: // Shop Case shopopen(p, 700); // shop id items = Engine.shops.skillcapeStore; // Declaring this from Shops.java itemsN = Engine.shops.skillcapeStoreN; // Declaring this from Shops.java p.getActionSender().setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); p.getActionSender().setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, items, itemsN); break;

What I added in NPCOption1 & 2

case 552: //Shopkeeper (test) Engine.ShopHandler.openshop(p, 20); //Test p.message("You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab"); break;

And this is till all I get…

Unhandled npc option 1 : 146 <- id.

Now what I did notice is that the case numbers in NPCOption1 & 2 didn’t correspond to the NPC ID’s that they were sync’d with. But they still work. I’m a bit confused…

If anyone could help I have:
TeamViewer: 228 987 374
----Pass: PM me for it.
MSN Messenger: Ethanbowne@yahoo.com
Skype: Ogreslay

Read full topic
